biotools.summary: DeePhage is a tool for identifying temperate phage-derived and virulent phage-derived sequence in metavirome data using deep learning. DeePhage is designed to identify metavirome sequences as temperate phage-derived and virulent phage-derived sequences.

bioschemas.name: DeePhage
bioschemas.summary: DeePhage is a tool for identifying temperate phage-derived and virulent phage-derived sequence in metavirome data using deep learning. DeePhage is designed to identify metavirome sequences as temperate phage-derived and virulent phage-derived sequences.
